overview:
Andrew manages all financial, legal and administrative aspects of Badoo. His work at PricewaterhouseCoopers, Sony, V2 Music Group and his key role in establishing the award-winning partnership between European Directories and Skype, has taken him throughout the world. His invaluable expertise in international finance and business development makes him ideally suited to oversee the financial health and growth of Badoo.

Andrew qualified as a Chartered Accountant at PricewaterhouseCoopers, and then moved to global giant Sony Corporation, which resulted in the beginning of his world travels working throughout the Americas and Asia. Andrew then spent several years in the music industry, including serving as Finance Director at V2 Music Group, where he helped lead the business’s restructuring and eventual sale to Universal. He later managed and then sold the V2 Music Publishing business on behalf of Morgan Stanley. Andrew moved into the online world at European Directories, where he was Vice President of Online Business Development and worked on partnerships across Europe including his lead role in establishing their award-winning partnership with Skype.
